revised_title: Thermal Lens Spectrometry and Enantiometric Purity Determination in Chemistry
tldr: This article discusses two innovative techniques in chemistry: thermal lens spectrometry, a laser-based method for sensitive spectrophotometric analysis in nanolitre volumes, and enantiometric purity determination using a laser-based polarimetric HPLC detector. These methods provide significant advances in the quantitation and analysis of chiral molecules.
